title: BT to Cut up to 55,000 Jobs by 2030 Amid Shift to AI
description: Undated handout photo issued by BT Group of a general view of their new global headquarters in Aldgate, east London. (BT Group via PA Media)

title: Internet Trolls Who Encourage Serious Self-Harm Face 5 Years in Jail
description: Image shows a woman looking at social media applications Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, Whatsapp, Twitter, Messenger, and LinkedIn on a smartphone in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia on March 22, 2018. (Manan Vatsyayana/AFP/Getty Images)

title: Montana Becomes First US State to Completely Ban TikTok
description: The logo for social media app TikTok is displayed on the screen of an iPhone on an American flag background in Arlington, Va., on Aug. 3, 2020. (Olivier Douliery/AFP via Getty Images)
